TextView.android:text: Thank you for installing xkcd Now Widget.

Add the widget like any other normal android widget. \nThis widget shows the current time around the globe. To read it, simply find your location and compare its location to the outside ring. The outside ring also shows when business and daylight hours and gives you a reminder of when it is proper to call someone in a certain location. \nThis widget is a port of Randall Munroe's www.xkcd.com/now and was created by Reshef Elisha
